summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1333, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue from East Pike Street to the north line of Albion Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 14979 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
